<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"GenerateRewardsRoot"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/rewards/v1/generate-rewards-root"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



GenerateRewardsRoot generates a rewards root for the given snapshot.
Returns an error if the rewards have not been generated for the snapshot.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"cutoffDate":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"rewardsCalcEndDate":{"type":"string"},"rewardsRoot":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
